error.not_enough: Not enough trains for the journey

display.title: Display
display.show_badges_hint: Having trouble seeing the difference in the colours? Turn on status badges!

solution.lose_message: Oh no, looks like you got lost in $t(brand:brand.city)...
solution.title: Today's Journey

about.title: How to Play
about.explanation:
Multiple routings may be possible to make the trip, but your goal is to find the one routing that matches the puzzle of the day. The solution may or may not be the fastest or efficient routing.

Routing for each train line is based on weekday off-peak schedule (except the S8 runs to Hanau Hbf).

examples.title: Examples
examples.correct: is in the correct position of the trip.
examples.present: is part of the trip, but in the wrong position.
examples.absent: is not part of the trip in any position.
